data.lyric:
[ti:Cops Shot The Kid (Explicit)]
[ar:Nas]
[al:NASIR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]Cops Shot The Kid (Clean) - Nas/Kanye West
[00:00.03]Richard Pryor：
[00:00.18]The cops used to come around
[00:01.01]You know my neighborhood
[00:02.08]Alright you kids stop having so much fun move along
[00:05.11]Oh they'd arrest me you know especially at night
[00:07.09]They had a curfew right n**gas had to be home by 11 negros 12
[00:10.61]You'd be trying to get home you know
[00:12.26]Doing your crew runs
[00:13.50]And they'd always catch you out in front of a store or something
[00:16.16]'Cause you'd be taking shortcuts right
[00:17.78]Cops Ree put your hands up black boy
[00:19.82]Slick Rick：
[00:21.04]The cops shot the kid
[00:21.84]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[00:23.22]The cops shot the kid
[00:24.13]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[00:25.55]The cops shot the kid
[00:26.42]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[00:27.89]The cops shot the kid
[00:28.78]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[00:30.31]The cops shot the kid
[00:31.25]Nas：
[00:31.42]I don't wanna hurt nobody
[00:33.38]We just came here to party
[00:35.08]See a few dames exchange some names
[00:37.28]I'm a top shotta kid stay in your lane
[00:39.63]The cop shot the kid same old scene
[00:41.87]Pour out a little liquor champagne for pain
[00:45.31]Slap-boxin' in the street
[00:47.58]Crack the hydrant in the heat
[00:49.89]Cop cars on the creep
[00:51.41]Doin' they round-ups we just watch for the sweep
[00:54.13]Yeah it's hotter than July
[00:56.81]It's the summer when n**gas die
[00:58.91]It's the summer when n**gas ride
[01:00.80]Together we'll be strong but forever we divide
[01:03.81]So y'all are blowin' my high
[01:05.77]Type of sh*t that's killin' my vibe
[01:08.38]White kids are brought in alive
[01:10.43]Black kids get hit with like five
[01:12.75]Get scared you panic you're goin' down
[01:15.23]The disadvantages of the brown
[01:17.86]How in the hell the parents gon' bury their own kids
[01:20.12]Not the other way around
[01:22.50]Reminds me of Emmett Till
[01:24.85]Let's remind 'em why Kap kneels
[01:25.94]Slick Rick：
[01:26.46]The cops shot the kid
[01:27.27]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[01:28.57]The cops shot the kid
[01:29.43]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[01:30.87]The cops shot the kid
[01:31.80]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[01:33.29]The cops shot the kid
[01:34.22]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[01:35.69]The cops shot the kid
[01:36.55]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[01:37.99]The cops shot the kid
[01:38.93]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[01:40.42]The cops shot the kid
[01:41.29]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[01:42.75]The cops shot the kid
[01:43.71]I still hear him scream
[01:44.81]Kanye West：
[01:45.38]Stay tuned up and down your timeline
[01:47.90]This fake news people is all lyin'
[01:50.09]Money is bein' made when a mom cries
[01:52.55]Won't be satisfied 'til we all die
[01:54.93]Tell me who do we call to report crime
[01:57.06]If 9-1-1 doin' the driveby
[01:59.44]It's certain things I can't abide by
[02:01.91]I ain't bein' extreme this is my side
[02:04.06]Talkin' big sh*t ready to die
[02:06.47]I know every story got two sides
[02:08.89]Claimin' he paranoid by the black guy
[02:11.27]Cop wanna make it home by nighttime
[02:13.59]Just a good kid he wasn't that guy
[02:15.88]Had a little hit he wasn't that high
[02:18.25]Cop gon' claim that it was self-defense
[02:20.54]Say he was ridin' dirty so the case rests
[02:22.44]Slick Rick/Kanye West：
[02:23.03]The cops shot the kid
[02:23.20]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[02:23.91]Workin' nine-to-five
[02:24.64]The cops shot the kid
[02:25.53]The cops shot the kid
[02:26.47]Tryna stay alive
[02:27.11]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
[02:28.48]Makin' ends meet
[02:29.42]The cops shot the kid
[02:30.25]The cops shot the kid
[02:31.00]Shot him this week
[02:31.65]The cops shot the kid
[02:32.60]The cops shot the kid the cops shot
